description: Visual Studio Code collects telemetry data, which is used to help understand how to improve the product.
name: VSCode

telemetry.name: Usage data
telemetry.description: VS Code collects usage data that helps to debug issues, such as slow start-up times, and to prioritize new features.

telemetry.name: Crash data
telemetry.description: VS Code collects data about any crashes that occur and sends it to Microsoft to help improve our products and services.
